amendment.description: To direct the Secretary of Commerce, acting through the Assistant Secretary of Commerce for Communications and Information, to conduct a study of the national security risks posed by consumer routers, modems, and devices that combine a modem and router, and for other purposes.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3489 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 3489 proposed by Senator Wicker for Senator Blackburn to Amendment SA 3748. To direct the Secretary of Commerce, acting through the Assistant Secretary of Commerce for Communications and Information, to conduct a study of the national security risks posed by consumer routers, modems, and devices that combine a modem and router, and for other purposes.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3489 proposed by Senator Wicker for Senator Blackburn to Amendment SA 3748.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3489 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
